FynnTesting: ^CIELLE: You know this market’s been pretty fun to roam around...
^COSMO: Yeah! It’s been pretty- Woah! This guy is huge! If they step on us it’s game over...
^CIELLE: My name is Cielle and this is Cosmo! We’re out exploring the marketplace!
^COSMO: ...That's all he has? Okay we’re clearly going to be wearing pants in this conversation...
^CIELLE: Are you... the overseer of the festival’s cooking?
^???: Yeah that's me. The name’s Fynn.
^COSMO: Great! We were hoping to find you!
^CIELLE: Oh! We’re going around and meeting new people!
^COSMO: ...And we got told to look for you for more information about the food and culture here at the festival!
^FYNN: Hmm. What do you want to know?
Cooking: ^CIELLE: We were curious to learn about the food you prepare...
^FYNN: Every piece of produce you have seen in the market has come straight from the Earth.
^FYNN: The Calmaaj tribe take the seeds that the Pluvia provide us with and plant them into the rich, fertile soil around these lands.
^FYNN: The Navemar and Marquina also bring their spoils from the ocean for me to cook with.
^COSMO: So, all the food around here is made by you?
^FYNN: Either I’m making it myself, or I am instructing others on how to.
^CIELLE: So everyone here’s eating your meals! That’s a lot of food to cook...
^COSMO: Looks like his cooking skills make up for his lack of social ones...
^CIELLE: Well, I think that’s amazing! Everything smells so good around here! You should be proud!
AboutFynn: ^CIELLE: So, how did you become the Culinary Overseer of the festival?
^FYNN: My family attends the Aster festival every year...
^FYNN: I would bring cooked meals and good produce, and everyone couldn’t seem to get enough. I just became the ‘culinary’ guy to everyone...
^COSMO: You don’t sound that happy about it...
^FYNN: Hmm? It’s alright. The festival is a great way to gain an income... especially through selling my meals to a large group of people...
^COSMO: Besides cooking, with your role, what else do you do around here?
^FYNN: When I’m not cooking, I’m still working.
^FYNN: I’m either out in the nearby fields making sure that the produce we grow is still up to a high quality...
^FYNN: Otherwise, I’m spending time looking at all the goods we have available here to craft new recipes...
^CIELLE: It’d be so nice to be working with food all the time. If it were me, I’d eat all the sweets in a flash...
^COSMO: ...And you would also become round in a flash. Then we’d look like twins! I’d be the better looking twin though...
Culture: ^CIELLE: We were wondering if you could tell us a bit about the culture of the festival!
^FYNN: Hmm... Fortunately for me, food is one key aspect of the Aster Festival...
^FYNN: Around this time every year, nature gives us a cornucopia of produce; more than any other season.
^FYNN: It lines up well with the timing of the festival...
^FYNN: Celebrating the history of the market has always been accompanied by everyone eating good food...
^CIELLE: So that’s why we’ve been seeing a lot of produce around here...
^CIELLE: It makes sense why they would need someone to be the Overseer of all the culinary side of things…
^CIELLE: Spending all day eating food sounds great honestly, don’t you think Cosmo? I’d fall right asleep after eating so much...
^COSMO: Right?! I’m sure we walked past someone ready to just hit the sack...
^FYNN: Huh? What?! Someone just hit Zack?!
^FYNN: Is he okay?! Where is he?!
^CIELLE: It’s alright! Hit the sack... not... Zack? We were talking about going to sleep...
^FYNN: My husband’s called Zack... I tuned out and then tuned right back in when I thought you said that someone just hit him...
^COSMO: That was a COMPLETE one-eighty from what you’re normally like...
^FYNN: I’m always worried that something is going to happen to him while he’s out.
^CIELLE: It’s sweet that you care so much! Some people could learn to be as compassionate as you...
^COSMO: Hey! I care about people! I can name at least... um... three people that I hold dear!
FinalKnot: ^FYNN: Was that all you needed from me?
^COSMO: Think so! I got a load of data!
^CIELLE: Yeah! Thank you for taking the time to teach us. We’ll be off!!
